label: 惣領制
本: Medieval Japan:  Essays in Institutional History . Stanford University Press . 1974
著者: Hall, John W. and Mass, Jeffery P.
説明文: System of divided inheritance of family property used by warrior houses in late Heian and Kamakura periods; designation also for a pattern of warrior organization in which, despite divided inheritance, general leadership over the extended family was retained by the house head.
